about_the_game:
If you love riding trains, making tough decisions, or just having fun smashing everything in your path, this pack is made just for you!

With it, you'll get a magnificent pure gold train and festive confetti to replace the usual smoke – isn't that a dream come true?

IMPORTANT: By purchasing this DLC, you're not just getting an amazing skin, but you're also supporting the development of this game and our future exciting projects!

This DLC doesn't provide any gameplay advantages, but it does give you the most stylish and unique look in the world!

If you love riding trains, making tough decisions, or just having fun smashing everything in your path, this pack is made just for you!

With it, you'll get a magnificent pure gold train and festive confetti to replace the usual smoke – isn't that a dream come true?

IMPORTANT: By purchasing this DLC, you're not just getting an amazing skin, but you're also supporting the development of this game and our future exciting projects!

This DLC doesn't provide any gameplay advantages, but it does give you the most stylish and unique look in the world!
name: Choo-Choose - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU (Dual Core recommended)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible with 256 MB memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A DLC that gives your train a golden skin and replaces the usual smoke with festive confetti.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Simplified Chinese*, French*, Korean*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
